text: Congo participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The Congo team consisted of 4 athletes competing in 4 sports: athletics, table tennis, taekwondo and wrestling. ==Athletics== ===Girls=== ;Track and Road Events {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan=2|Athletes !rowspan=2|Event !colspan=2|Qualification !colspan=2|Final |- !Result !Rank !Result !Rank |- |Merveille Mezame-Egeindita |Girls’ 100m |align=center|13.11 |align=center|22 qC |align=center|13.10 |align=center|20 |} ==Table tennis== ;Individual {| class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan=2|Athlete !rowspan=2|Event !colspan=2|Round 1 !colspan=2|Round 2 !rowspan=2|Quarterfinals !rowspan=2|Semifinals !rowspan=2|Final !rowspan=2|Rank |- !Group Matches !Rank !Group Matches !Rank |- |rowspan=3|Jolie Mafuta Ivoso |rowspan=3|Girls' Singles |align=center| L 0-3 (3-11, 6-11, 3-11) |rowspan=3 align=center|4 qB |align=center| L 0-3 (4-11, 6-11, 2-11) |rowspan=3 align=center|3 |rowspan=3 colspan=3 align=center|Did not advance |rowspan=3 align=center|25 |- |align=center| L 0-3 (3-11, 9-11, 2-11) |align=center|BYE |- |align=center| L 0-3 (2-11, 4-11, 4-11) |align=center| L 0-3 (3-11, 2-11, 5-11) |} ;Team {| class="wikitable" border="1" style="font- size:90%" |- !rowspan=2|Athlete !rowspan=2|Event !colspan=2|Round 1 !rowspan=2|Round 2 !rowspan=2|Quarterfinals !rowspan=2|Semifinals !rowspan=2|Final !rowspan=2|Rank |- !Group Matches !Rank |- |rowspan=3|Africa 2 |rowspan=3|Mixed Team |align=center|Europe 3 L 0-3 (0-3, 0-3, 1-3) |rowspan=3 align=center|4 qB |align=center rowspan=3|Intercontinental 2 L 0-2 (0-3, 0-3) |rowspan=3 colspan=3 align=center|Did not advance |rowspan=3 align=center|25 |- |align=center|Europe 4 L 0-3 (0-3, 0-3, 0-3) |- |align=center|Europe 1 L 0-3 (0-3, 1-3, 0-3) |} ==Taekwondo== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;
